not_found_text: The page you are looking for does not exist.
name: Name
dashboard_chart_heading_text: Please review the daily sales, purchases, incomes & expenses for last 7 days, monthly & yearly charts.
alpha_dash_error: Only letters, numbers and dashes with length of 2 to 25 characters.
record_updated: The record has been successfully updated.
record_added: The record has been successfully added.
record_deleted: The record has been successfully deleted.
invalid_form_error: Form is not valid, please check invalid fields before submitting.
no_result: No data to display for the search result
delete_confirm: This action will have permanent effect that can not be reversed.
avatar_error_text: Avatar image must be smaller than 1000x1000 pixels and width should be equal to height.
login_heading: Please login to access your account.
reset_password_heading: Please type your email address and new password.
forgot_password_heading: Please type your email address to get reset password instructions.
invalid_input_error: The input is not valid, please try again.
reset_email_text: We have sent you email with reset password instructions.
password_rest_text: You have successfully reset your password.
same_password_error: New password cannot be same as your current password
opts_separated_by_pipe: Option should be separated by pipe i.e, Red|Blue|Black
login_failed_error_text: The login url is wrong and try again. If error persist, check error log and send to your developer.
failed_error_text: The request has been failed, please reload page and try again. If error persist, check error log and send to your developer.
failed_record_delete_text: The request has been failed as there are relational data saved for this record.
delete_error: The request has been failed as there are relational data (:relations) saved for this record.
bulk_failed_error_text: The request has been failed, the records can't be deleted as those are attached with others data.
records_deleted: The records has been successfully deleted except those having attachment with others.
same_location_error: To & From Locations can not be same.
settings_heading_text: Please update the settings by modifying them below
password_error: Password is required & at least 6 characters long
allow_price_change: Allow to change price on sale
tax_inclusive: Tax is included in the price
title: Title
not_allowed_resource: You are not allowed to access the requested resource.
unknown_error_text: Please reload the application and then try again.
network_error_text: Unable to connect to server, please check your Internet connection.
token_expired_text: The page token has been expired, please refresh the page and then try again.
token_was_expired_text: The page token has been refreshed, please try again.
unknown_error_text2: Unknown error occurred! please reopen the application and then try again later.
not_uploaded_yet: Not yet uploaded! please submit the form to upload.
max_discount_tip: Maximum percentage discount allowed i.e, 20 or 50
max_discount_settings_tip: This amount will have priority over the maximum discount of items.
no_item_in_category: There is no item to display in the selected category.
invalid_ref_error: There is another order with this reference/table number.
new_order_opened: New order has been opened successfully.
price_tip: Price should be equal or more then cost
min_cost_error: Cost should be equal or more then {min}
min_price_error: Price should be equal or more then {min}
apply_to_order_items: Apply to order items (previous discount will be replaced)
empty_order_error: The order is empty, please add item to order then try again.
coming_soon_text: This feature is not yet complete.
swipe_card_text: Swipe card here then write security code manually
order_saved_text: The order has been saved automatically.
registers_open_text: Please go back to dashboard and select different location.
register_opened_error: You have selected the wrong {y} location, you already have opened register at {x} location.
wrong_location: Something wrong! you already have opened register, please go back to dashboard.
first_login: Force password change on next login
require_password_text: Always require password when switching user
click_drag: Click or drag files here to upload
empty_order_msg: Order is empty, please add at least one item!
empty_order_text: Please search the item by code or name to add to the order list, you can scan the barcode too.
require_country_tip: must enable if you have state level taxes
order_draft_text: This order is still a draft.
order_void_text: This order is marked as void.
auto_payment_text: Auto create payment for this order
not_saved_text: Change the page will result in form data loss.
email_failed: The action has been failed due to invalid email address.
disabled_in_demo: This feature is disabled on demo.
no_payment_added: No payment has been added to order yet
select_items_or_categories: Please select at least one item or category
not_allowed_error: The action you are trying to perform is restricted
item_has_variants: This item has variants, i.e size, color, material etc
receipt_has_variants: This recipe has variants, i.e size/portion
variant_name_tip: Variant Name, i.e Size, Color etc
variant_options_tip: Variant Options separated by|pipe symbol, i.e Black|Blue|Red
invalid_variant_error: No variant or invalid variant is provided and is not added to variants list.
item_has_serial: This item has serial numbers, i.e IMEI etc
user_not_active: Account is not active, please contact administrator for more information.
user_cannot_impersonate: Account is can not be impersonated, please contact administrator for more information.
generate_variations_text: You will loss all the data in variants table including location related data.
invalid_variants_error: You must have more than 1 options added to the variants to generate variations.
variations_qty_error_text: Variations quantity does not match with the location variation quantity.
auto_open_order_text: Auto open first order on POS
pos_for_restaurant: Enable restaurant feature for POS i.e, Halls, Tables & Recipe Items
select_hall_to_load_tables: Please select hall to load tables
no_table_to_display: There is no table for the selected hall
order_exists_text: The order has been selected with reference
categories_sidebar_initial: Set categories sidebar initially collapsed on POS screen
item_has_expiry_date: This item has expiry date (show input while purchasing)
item_code_digits: Number of digits for item code
cant_find_item: System unable to find any item with code `{code}` or `{x}`
hourly_rate_tip: Only set hourly rate, if user don't have fixed salary to calculate salary for working hours
salary_tip: If salary is not set, system will calculate salary by hourly rate.
advance_salary_text: This is advance payment and shall be deducted from next salary
auto_open_print_dialog_on_pos: Automatically print or open browser print dialog
only_for_company_record: This copy of bill is not official receipt but only to get the payment.
gift_card_payment_error: Gift card balance is less than the payment amount.
items_required: Please add at least one item to the order list.
gift_card_used: Gift card has used for the payment (reference :reference)
gift_card_updated: Gift card has been updated from amount :old_amount, balance :old_balance to amount :new_amount with balance :new_balance
serials_and_stock_not_match: Stock do not match serials count (stock :stock, serials :serials)
register_already_opened: You already have opened register. Please reload the page.
user_x_points: You can not use more than user current point :points
order_cgd: This is a computer-generated document. No signature is required.
review_payment_text: Payment has been marked as received
auto_generated_with_recurring: This is auto generated sale with recurring sale id {x}
search_item_ph: Type item name and press enter
no_permissions: You do not have permission to perform this action.
approve_text: You will not be able to change it later.
card_number_error: Card number should be 16 characters long.
payment_charged_text: Payment charge has been successfully initiated.
payment_redirect_text: We are redirecting you to payment gateway page.
can_impersonate_text: This user can be impersonated (login with QR Code)
low_points_error: Available points are lower then provided number.
thank_you_for_shopping: Thank you for shopping with us.
auto_update_text: Enable auto update (cron job need to be setup)
pos_server_error: POS Print Server error event has been received and logged to console.
customer_balance_tip:
+ve balance means customer due amount
-ve balance means advance payment/deposit
supplier_balance_tip:
+ve balance means payable to supplier
-ve balance means advance payment/deposit
pos_server_reconnect_text: Trying to connect to POS print server!
pos_server_connection_error: POS print server connection failed! please make sure POS Server is up & running fine.
cv_feedback_text: If you are happy with our services, please tell to your friends otherwise let us know so that we can improve.
label_print_instructions:
Print will be sent by browser.
Please disable Footer, Header & Margins, set Scale/Zoom to 100% in browser print settings.
label_instructions_text:
To add text, type the text & click Add Text
To add textarea, click Add Textarea and you should be able to edit the text
To add barcode, click Add Barcode and position it as you like
To delete object, select it first then click remove button
If you change the size, you will need to remove and add barcode, price and product details again.
